28g PROTEIN
Single Serving

SINGLE-SERVING PEANUT BUTTER CHEESECAKE

A quick and easy single-serving peanut butter cheesecake for one.

28g
Protein
250
Calories
10m
Total Time
1
Yield

Nutrition per 1 serving

Carbs10g
Fat15g
Fiber3g
Sugar4g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 60g cream cheese
  • 30g plain Greek yogurt
  • 30g vanilla whey protein
  • 30g peanut butter
  • 1 tbsp powdered sweetener

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Mix

In a small bowl, mix all ingredients until smooth and creamy.

2

Chill

Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to firm up.

3

Garnish

Top with a sprinkle of crushed peanuts or a drizzle of melted chocolate.

4

Serve

Enjoy your single-serving protein cheesecake.

5

Variations

Try with almond butter or cashew butter for a different flavor.

6

Storage

This can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 2 days.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
